name: DismissPullRequestReview
description:
Dismiss a pull request review on GitHub.

This tool allows you to dismiss a review on a pull request within a GitHub repository. It requires repository administrator privileges or permissions to dismiss reviews on protected branches.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The username of the repository owner. This is not case sensitive and refers to the account that owns the repository.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the pull request to dismiss the review for.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: review_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the pull request review to be dismissed.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the review.

parameters.name: dismissal_message
parameters.description: The message explaining the reason for dismissing the pull request review.

value_schema.description: The message for the pull request review dismissal

parameters.name: dismissal_event
parameters.description: This is a required event type for dismissing a pull request review. Use 'DISMISS' to perform the dismissal action.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: review_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the review.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the review.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message for the pull request review dismissal

value_schema.description: The message for the pull request review dismissal

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
